> > 1. Iterate until output stabilizes or N iterations
> > have been performed. (N=10 or 100)
> >
> > 2. Same as 1 but if it doesn't stabilize by N
> > iterations set output to the maximally wrong value.

Another option would be to process for N iterations regardless of when
it stabilizes and take the output of the final iteration.
